title: RetroArch
description: RetroArch is a frontend for emulators, game engines and media players.

title: DurangoFTP
description: Transfer files wirelessly on your local network! (No longer recommended)

title: PPSSPP
description: Standalone PlayStation Portable Emulator.

title: Flycast
description: Standalone Sega Dreamcast, Naomi, Naomi 2, and Atomiswave Emulator.

title: XBSX2
description: Standalone PlayStation 2 Emulator.

title: Retrix Gold
description: Retrix Gold is a frontend for Libretro Cores, it supports less than RetroArch currently but is much simpler to use.

title: Kodi
description: A free and open source media player application.

title: Cave Story
description: A complete open-source clone/rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).

title: Trogdor Reburninated
description: Trogdor burninates the countryside, peasants, and thatched-roof cottages of Peasantry.

title: DevilutionX
description: A source port of Diablo and Hellfire that strives to make it simple to run the game while providing engine improvements, bugfixes, and some optional quality of life features.

title: Heart of Darkness
description: A fiendish force scours the land in search of Andy, a young boy on a quest to rescue his dog Whisky.

title: OpenLara
description: Explore Peru, Greece, Egypt and the lost continent of Atlantis in search of an ancient artifact.

title: Relic Hunters Zero
description: A remaster of the FREE 1 million player hit game about blasting evil space ducks and turtles with tiny cute guns.

title: Prince of Persia
description: Navigate dungeons by running, climbing, and avoiding traps. A familiar looking pursuer awaits.

title: VVVVVV
description: A challenging 2D action/platformer with one deceptively simple gameplay mechanic.

title: Sonic Mania
description: Re-live the Sonic of the past with an exciting new twist on classic zones while fighting against new bosses and Dr. Eggman's evil robot army.

title: Sonic 1
description: Play as a blue little lad and destroy the monstrous rancid EggMan.

title: Sonic 2
description: Play as a blue little lad and destroy the monstrous rancid EggMan. This time with a friend!

title: Sonic CD
description: Travel through time to defeat a metallic doppelganger and save your platonic pink friend!

title: Sonic 1 SMS Remake
description: This game is a redesigned version of the Master System released by SEGA in 1991

title: Sonic 2 SMS Remake
description: This game is a redesigned version of the Master System released by SEGA in 1992

title: Sonic Time Twisted
description: Sonic Time Twisted is an unofficial classic-style Sonic the Hedgehog fangame

title: Twitch
description: Watch your favorite livestreams on Twitch!

title: YouTube
description: YouTube is a free video sharing website that makes it easy to watch online videos.
